books.author: by William P. Young
books.description: A man whose daughter was abducted is invited to an isolated shack, apparently by God.
books.name: THE SHACK

books.author: by Lisa Kleypas
books.description: A retiring game-designing debutante is drawn into a scandal with a London rake.
books.name: DEVIL IN SPRING

books.author: by Liane Moriarty
books.description: Who will end up dead, and how, when three mothers with children in the same school become friends?
books.name: BIG LITTLE LIES

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE

books.author: by Chuck Wendig
books.description: The conclusion to the Star Wars trilogy set in the years between "Return of the Jedi" and "The Force Awakens."
books.name: AFTERMATH:: EMPIRE'S END

books.author: by J. D. Robb
books.description: Lt. Eve Dallas of the N.Y.P.D. investigates a fatal home invasion. By Nora Roberts, writing pseudonymously.
books.name: ECHOES IN DEATH

books.author: by Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The psychologist Alex Delaware and the L.A.P.D. Lt. Milo Sturgis investigate the mysterious death of an elderly woman.
books.name: HEARTBREAK HOTEL

books.author: by George Saunders
books.description: Visiting the grave of his recently deceased young son in 1862, Abraham Lincoln encounters a cemetery full of ghosts.
books.name: LINCOLN IN THE BARDO

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A girl is instructed to deliver a series of letters after her grandmother dies.
books.name: MY GRANDMOTHER ASKED ME TO TELL YOU SHE'S SORRY

books.author: by Pam Jenoff
books.description: Two aerialists forge a close friendship in a German traveling circus during World War II.
books.name: THE ORPHAN'S TALE

books.author: by James Patterson and Michael Ledwidge
books.description: Detective Michael Bennett must stop a team of assassins prowling the Upper West Side.
books.name: BULLSEYE

books.author: by Lisa Gardner
books.description: The former F.B.I. profiler Pierce Quincy and his partner, Rainie Conner, foster a girl whose older brother murdered their drunken father. Now, eight years later, he has killed again.
books.name: RIGHT BEHIND YOU
